DOC.brief_summary: Primary : To compare efficacy TACE TAIE . Secondary : To compare side effect TACE TAIE . The outcome measurement include survival benefit tumour regression induce two therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study Efficacy Transcatheter Arterial Chemoembolization ( TACE ) Transcatheter Arterial Pegylated Interferon Embolization ( TAIE ) Liver Cancer
DOC.criteria: Confirmed hepatocellular carcinoma suitable surgery Portal vein thrombosis Severe arteriovenous shunt Bilirubin level > 50 umol/mL Prothrombin time > 5 second
